settings.heading: Guaranteed Authenticity
settings.text:
Each item in our memorabilia line includes:

  • Certificate of Authenticity
  • A NFC chip
  • An official tamper-proof OKTAGON MMA hologram with a unique serial number

The serial number is permanently registered in our internal database and serves as the key to confirming your item’s authenticity.
Enter the number to view the item’s verification profile, which includes the item’s name, photos, the date it was signed (if applicable), and information about the related event or fighter. The certification and verification system for memorabilia is effective from June 16, 2025.

settings.heading: How We Verify Autographs
settings.text:
Every autograph is 100% authentic and obtained under the direct supervision of the OKTAGON MMA team.
Autographs are collected exclusively during:

  • Official signing sessions
  • Private fighter signings arranged by our Memorabilia team
  • Media and promotional appearances monitored by OKTAGON MMA

We guarantee the authenticity of every autograph on our collectibles.

settings.heading: OWN A PIECE OF HISTORY
settings.subheading:
OKTAGON MMA Memorabilia offers guaranteed authenticity.
Every OKTAGON MMA collectible is a certified original, created for true fans of the sport and authenticated by the organization itself.
From gear worn by fighters to limited-edition signed prints, each item is more than just a product — it’s a piece of OKTAGON history.
settings.image_figcaption: Our official, tamper-proof hologram certifies that each item is 100% authentic and officially licensed.

settings.heading: Verify Your OKTAGON MMA Memorabilia
settings.subheading:
Enter the serial number found on your item to confirm its authenticity and view detailed information.
The serial number is printed directly on the hologram.
